article.title: Rockwell Provides Black Hawk Simulator Device
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Transportable Black Hawk Operations Simulator Device

article.text: Rockwell Collins Simulation and Training Solutions, Huntsville, Alabama, was awarded a $35,774,525 firm-fixed-price contract modification to procure the Transportable Black Hawk Operations Simulator Device. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
